MARENE  SANI  
 
Cloud  and infrastructure Engineer  
 
 
PROFILE  INFO  
I'm a Cloud Engineer/Infrastructure Architect, with 10 years of experience, practicing the Devops philosophy. I've been

other adventures.  My aim is to build infrastructures  that are flexible,  automatable,  highly  available  and secure,  so as to make  
them self-sufficient  and facilitate  the work of your teams  at all times.
